column2: UNITED OVERSEAS BANK NOMINEES PRIVATE LIMITED
EE XING CHEN DECLAN @ EE YAN JIN

column1: # PERCENTAGE IS CALCULATED BASED ON 219,074,844 ISSUED SHARES, EXCLUDING TREASURY SHARES.
SHAREHOLDINGS IN THE HANDS OF PUBLIC
THE PERCENTAGE OF SHAREHOLDINGS IN THE HANDS OF THE PUBLIC IS APPROXIMATELY 54%. HENCE, THE COMPANY HAS
COMPLIED WITH RULE 723 OF THE LISTING MANUAL OF THE SINGAPORE EXCHANGE SECURITIES TRADING LIMITED WHICH STATES
THAT AN ISSUER MUST ENSURE THAT AT LEAST 10% OF ITS LISTED SECURITIES IS AT ALL TIMES HELD BY THE PUBLIC.
